questions.question: What is the predominant color of the phone case's exterior?
What appears to be the primary material of the phone case?
Describing the surface texture, is it smooth or does it have a discernible pattern?
What is the overall shape or form factor of the protective case?
Considering its design, is the case primarily protective or decorative?
Does the case feature any noticeable cutouts or openings for ports?
Considering its functionality, what is the case designed to protect?
Based on the image, is the case rigid or flexible in nature?
What is the visual effect of the reflective section of the case?
Judging by the display, does the case offer a viewable window?
Does the case have a noticeable flip or folding mechanism?
What design feature is shown on the reflective surface?
Describe the apparent finish of the phone case's non-reflective parts.
Does the case seem to offer full or partial phone coverage?
What is the style of the case based on its folding mechanism?
